column4: hi guys, why in ubuntu 8.04.1, in /etc/hosts file, I have 127.0.0.1 and 127.0.1.1 ?
hugleo? is that because of Apache?
ow.. then if my network IP is 192.168.2.5 , and some one from the same network want to access my computer how can I refer them to 127.0.1.1 ?
are they trying to ssh in? or access shares?
